original_text: Many soldiers from Gad's tribe joined David's army at his strong place in the desert. These men were brave soldiers who knew how to fight well. They could use shields and spears. They could fight like lions. They could run as fast as deer on the mountains.
korean_text: 갓 사람 중에서 광야에 있는 요새에 이르러 다윗에게 돌아온 자가 있었으니 다 용사요 싸움에 익숙하여 방패와 창을 능히 쓰는 자라 그의 얼굴은 사자 같고 빠르기는 산의 사슴 같으니

sentences.original_text: Many soldiers from Gad's tribe joined David's army
sentences.korean_translation: 갓 지파의 많은 군사들이 다윗의 군대에 합류했습니다

sentences.original_text: at his strong place in the desert
who knew how to fight well
They could use shields and spears
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 방패와 창을 사용할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They could run as fast as deer
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 사슴처럼 빨리 달릴 수 있었습니다
